FIELD.NAME: blockid
FIELD.COMMENT: blockid is a foreign key that references the block table. This will be used to join our data rows to the block table

FIELD.NAME: pagetitle
FIELD.COMMENT: pagetitle is simply text that will be used for links to this simplehtml page

FIELD.NAME: displaytext
FIELD.COMMENT: displaytext field will be displayed as text on the simplehtml page, potentially as HTML

FIELD.NAME: format
FIELD.COMMENT: format field will contain the integer value that represents the format the text was entered in

FIELD.NAME: filename
FIELD.COMMENT: filename field stores the name of a file the instructor posts on the simplehtml page, which students can then download or view

FIELD.NAME: picture
FIELD.COMMENT: URL for the user's chosen picture is in a predefined static variable that associates a number to a picture

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: description field that will be displayed on the page.

FIELD.NAME: displaypicture
FIELD.COMMENT: displaypicture field will be the "yes" or "no" question on the form

FIELD.NAME: displaydate
FIELD.COMMENT: It is a UNIX timestamp which is an integer value
